channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Exploring the .NET boot process via host tracing
item.description: In this post we enable host tracing and use that to understand how a .NET app boots up via the dotnet muxer, hostfxr, and hostpolicy.dll Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/exploring-the-dotnet-boot-process-via-host-tracing/

item.title: Companies complaining .NET moves too fast should just pay for post-EOL support
item.description: In this post I describe a solution to .NET "releasing too quickly": just pay for support of older versions, such as HeroDevs' Never Ending Support for .NET 6 Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/companies-using-dotnet-need-to-suck-it-up-and-pay-for-support/
